sentences.translation: 每个人都喝着薄荷朱利酒。

sentences.sentence: In German hands, Juleps weren't just spirits, sugar, ice and mint.
sentences.translation: 在德国人的手中，冰镇薄荷酒不仅仅是酒精、糖、冰块和薄荷。

sentences.sentence: We could all sit on our porches drinking mint juleps while our houses appreciated 30% a year.
sentences.translation: 我们可以坐在门廊下，喝着冰镇薄荷酒，看着房子每年增值30%。
